EmailTemplate.name: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge (1340720628.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge (1340720628.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE You are very welcome! J From: dmckague@charter.net [mailto:dmckague@charter.net] Sent: Monday, June 25, 2012 9:49 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge 10935 Charring Cross CirWhitmore Lake, MI 48189 Thanks for taking care of this!Darren On Mon, Jun 25, 2012 at 6:47 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Hi Kerri, Thank you. Darren  please let me know the address where you are working and then I will be able to activate your account so we can get you billing. Have a great night! Sara From: Redlinger, Kerri [mailto:kredling@ball.com] <mailto:[mailto:kredling@ball.com]> Sent: Monday, June 25, 2012 6:14 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: dmckague@charter.net <mailto:dmckague@charter.net> Subject: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge Hi- Will have to defer to Darren Best Regards: Kerri Redlinger Ball Aerospace & Technologies Corp. 303- 939-5236 Phone 303- 939-4999 Fax kredling@ball.com <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(> Email From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Sent: Monday, June 25, 2012 11:31 AM To: Redlinger, Kerri Cc: dmckague@charter.net <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Subject: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge Hi Kerri (or Darren,) Could you let me know the address where Darren is preforming the work? Thanks, Sara From: Redlinger, Kerri [mailto:kredling@ball.com] <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Sent: Monday, June 25, 2012 1:15 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: dmckague@charter.net <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Subject: RE: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge Importance: High Sara- I dont know what you mean by task order. Attached is the contract. Is this what youre looking for? Best Regards: Kerri Redlinger Ball Aerospace & Technologies Corp. 303- 939-5236 Phone 303- 939-4999 Fax kredling@ball.com <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(> Email From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Sent: Monday, June 25, 2012 10:51 AM To: Redlinger, Kerri Cc: dmckague@charter.net <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Subject: Getting a Task Order for Darren McKauge Importance: High Hi Kerri, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you this morning. I need to know when MBO can expect a Task Order for Darren. Right now he is currently working at risk without an order and we cannot bill for the work he is doing. This is an urgent request. If you are not the correct contact please introduce me to the person who can help. We need to get this this order ASAP. Thank you, Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2012 5:17 PM To: 'Redlinger, Kerri' Cc: dmckague@charter.net <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Subject: RE: Contract Hi Kerri, I understand Darren is ready to get work started. Could you send me a copy of his Task order so we can get him ready to bill on our end? Thank you! Sara From: Redlinger, Kerri [mailto:kredling@ball.com] <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Sent: Friday, June 08, 2012 4:20 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: dmckague@charter.net <javascript:parent.wgMail.openComposeWindow(>Subject: Contract Hi Sara- Darrens contract number is 12KRPSA024. Thanks.
